ygData.subject: Re: Time for another Sylly Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: Day of the week to play: Monday thru Sunday Time of day: Evenings, early morning on weekends Longest stretch of continuous play: 20+ (I won t disclose the
ygData.messageBody:
Day of the week to play: Monday thru Sunday

Time of day: Evenings, early morning on weekends

Longest stretch of continuous play: 20+ (I won't disclose the exact count,
but I think my eyeglass prescription changed over this period of time). =)

Way to have game sounds: Used to be nice and loud until I found out how
ANNOYING summon food/water spells sound fx are. Ever since beta 3 I have
believed the EQ sound guy is a crack or meth head.

Distance to sit from display: 2 feet

TV show to have on: In no particular order - Comedy Channel, TLC,
Discovery, NFL football.

Music to listen to: Random mix of indie-rock, classic rock, 80's, some
electronica/dance/trance stuff

Beverage (non-alcoholic): Mr. Pibb!

Health Food: not applicable

Junk Food: pringles or nutter butters til they make me sick =P

Clothes to wear: I'm with the guys - boxers just rock, must..
have...circulation.



Sartori D'Elsiraad
48 Bard
Veeshan
